name: Muhammad Abubakar
bio: Detail-oriented Computer Science professional with experience in full-stack and mobile development, scalable architectures. Skilled in React (Vite), React Native, Angular, NestJS, Node.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, with strong problem solving, OOP, data structures, and database foundations. Proficient in AI-enhanced software development practices, using intelligent assistants to streamline coding and problem-solving.
